samples.instruction: Campus placement-ku eppadi prepare aavadhu?
samples.current_output: Placement preparation: 1) Aptitude - RS Aggarwal, IndiaBix daily 2) Technical - Core subjects revision 3) Coding - HackerRank, LeetCode (for IT) 4) Resume - 1 page, achievement focused 5) Communication - Mock interviews practice 6) GD - Current affairs, articulation 7) HR questions - self-intro, strengths, goals. Timeline: Start 6 months before placement season. CGPA matters - maintain above 7 minimum. Internships boost resume significantly.

samples.instruction: Therkku maavatta maanavarkalukku special scholarship ethavathu irukka?
samples.current_output: Aama. BC/MBC scholarship, first graduate scholarship, merit scholarship ellam apply pannalam. Tirunelveli, Thoothukudi, Kanyakumari district students-kku special priority irukku some schemes la.

samples.instruction: 10th public exam-ku eppadi prepare aavadhu? Topper tips enna?
samples.current_output: Topper strategies: 1) Textbook muzhmaiyaaga padiyunga - 80% questions textbook-lirundhu 2) Previous 5 years question papers practice 3) Blue print padi chapter-wise weightage kavaniyunga 4) Maths & Science: daily problem solving 5) Tamil/English: grammar + essay practice 6) Social: Map pointing + dates memorize. Time: Daily 6-8 hours. Last month: Revision only. TN Government question bank: www.dge.tn.gov.in

samples.instruction: Mock test ‡Æé‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡Æ©‡Øà ‡ÆÆ‡ØÅ‡Æ±‡Øà ‡Æé‡Æ¥‡ØÅ‡Æ§‡Æ£‡ØÅ‡ÆÆ‡Øç? ‡Æé‡Æ™‡Øç‡Æ™‡Æü‡Æø analyze ‡Æ™‡Æ£‡Øç‡Æ±‡Æ§‡ØÅ?
samples.current_output: Mock test frequency: Last 2 months - weekly 2-3. Last month - daily. Analysis steps: 1) Check answers immediately 2) Category-wise error (silly mistake, concept gap, time issue) 3) Track weak areas 4) Revise mistakes same day 5) Redo wrong questions after 3 days 6) Score tracking graph maintain 7) Time per question analysis 8) Attempt strategy review. Sources: Official previous papers, coaching test series, free online (Testbook, Gradeup). Quality > quantity of mocks.

samples.instruction: Rural students-ku enna special schemes irukku?
samples.current_output:
**Rural Student Benefits:**

**1. PMSSS:** Full fee + maintenance for meritorious

**2. Eklavya Schools:** Free residential (tribal) - emrs.tribal.gov.in

**3. KGBV:** Rural girls Class 6-12 residential

**4. Free Hostels:** BC/MBC/SC/ST hostels in all districts

**5. Transport Allowance:** ‚Çπ500-1,000/month

**6. Special Coaching:**
- TNSF rural NEET
- Block-level centers

**7. Agri Education:** Special quota in TNAU

**8. Distance Education:** IGNOU/TNOU in rural areas

**How to Get:**
- Rural certificate from VAO
- Apply through school
- Contact BEO

samples.instruction: NEET/JEE coaching-‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡ØÅ ‡Æ≤‡Æü‡Øç‡Æö‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡Æ£‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡Æø‡Æ≤‡Øç ‡Æö‡ØÜ‡Æ≤‡Æµ‡Ææ‡Æï‡ØÅ‡ÆÆ‡Øç, ‡Æé‡Æô‡Øç‡Æï‡Æ≥‡Ææ‡Æ≤‡Øç afford ‡Æ™‡Æ£‡Øç‡Æ£ ‡ÆÆ‡ØÅ‡Æü‡Æø‡ÆØ‡Ææ‡Æ§‡ØÅ. Chance ‡Æá‡Æ≤‡Øç‡Æ≤‡Øà‡ÆØ‡Ææ?
samples.current_output: Hope ‡Æâ‡Æ≥‡Øç‡Æ≥‡Æ§‡ØÅ! Free/Low-cost options: 1) Government free NEET/JEE coaching centres 2) School-based free coaching (apply through HM) 3) YouTube: Physics Wallah complete course free 4) NPTEL, SWAYAM free courses 5) Scholarship-based coaching: FIITJEE, Allen poor student schemes 6) Library resources - reference books available. Success stories: Many toppers from poor families using free resources. Key: Self-discipline and hard work. Money doesn't guarantee success.

samples.instruction: Sports-‡Æ≤‡Øç interest ‡Æá‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡ØÅ, ‡Æ™‡Æü‡Æø‡Æ™‡Øç‡Æ™‡ØÅ‡ÆÆ‡Øç sports-‡ÆÆ‡Øç combine ‡Æ™‡Æ£‡Øç‡Æ£ ‡ÆÆ‡ØÅ‡Æü‡Æø‡ÆØ‡ØÅ‡ÆÆ‡Ææ?
samples.current_output: Absolutely yes! Benefits: 1) Sports quota admission in colleges 2) Government jobs-‡Æ≤‡Øç extra marks 3) Scholarships for sportspersons 4) Health and discipline. How: 1) Join school sports team 2) District sports coaching centres - free 3) SAI (Sports Authority of India) training 4) Balance: Morning sports, evening study. Careers: Sports quota ‚Üí College ‚Üí Job OR Professional sports. Many IAS officers, doctors are sportspersons. Time management key.

samples.instruction: ‡Æâ‡Æ£‡Øç‡ÆÆ‡Øà‡ÆØ‡Ææ ‡Æ™‡Øä‡ÆØ‡Øç‡ÆØ‡Ææ: Myth: SC/ST reservation = undeserving students getting seats
samples.current_output: ‡Æâ‡Æ£‡Øç‡ÆÆ‡Øà: Fact: Reservation = Equalizing historical disadvantage. SC/ST students also clear cutoffs, just in their category. Many top performers are from reserved categories. Reservation doesn't mean zero merit - minimum marks required. Social mobility happening due to reservation - breaking caste barriers in education. Focus on your preparation, not others' category.

samples.instruction: NEET-ku prepare aaga enna pannanum-pa? Free coaching irukkuma?
samples.current_output: NCERT Biology, Physics, Chemistry - line by line read pannu/pannunga. Free coaching: Government centres-la apply pannu through school. Online free: YouTube (Physics Wallah), SWAYAM. 7.5% reservation govt school students-ku. Daily 6-8 hours padikka venum. Previous year papers practice important.

samples.instruction: Agriculture education padikka enna vazhi?
samples.current_output: TNAU (Tamil Nadu Agricultural University) Coimbatore-la BSc Agriculture, Horticulture, Forestry courses irukku. 12th Biology group padichirundha TNAU counselling moolam seralam. Government job opportunities niraiya.

samples.instruction: TNPSC Pothu Tamil ‡Æé‡Æ™‡Øç‡Æ™‡Æü‡Æø ‡Æ™‡Æü‡Æø‡Æ™‡Øç‡Æ™‡Æ§‡ØÅ?
samples.current_output: Pothu Tamil sections: 1) Ilakkanam (Grammar) - Ezhuthiyial, Solliyal, Porulathigaram 2) Ilakkiyam - Sangam to Modern literature 3) Tamil culture and heritage. Books: 6th-12th Tamil textbooks, TNPSC previous papers. High scoring: Grammar rules, author-work matching, literary periods. Daily practice: 50 questions. Ilakkanam: Vinaigal, Pechu vazhakku, Ezhuthuvazhi rules. Tamil literature: Thirukkural mandatory (1330 kurals meanings).

samples.instruction: College-la stress athigamaa irukku. Handle panrathu eppadi?
samples.current_output: Stress management: 1) Sleep 7-8 hours - non-negotiable 2) Exercise 30 min daily - even walking helps 3) Healthy food - avoid junk during stress 4) Break big tasks into small 5) Talk to friends, family 6) College counsellor - free service 7) Hobbies continue - music, sports, art 8) Social media break 9) Deep breathing when overwhelmed 10) Professional help if severe - no shame. Remember: Grades ‚â† Self-worth. You matter more than marks.

samples.instruction: Scholarship endha websites-la theduvadhu?
samples.current_output: Important websites: 1) scholarships.gov.in (NSP) - Government schemes 2) buddy4study.com - All scholarships aggregator 3) vidyalakshmi.co.in - Education loans + scholarships 4) respective state welfare department sites 5) University websites. Apps: Buddy4Study app, ScholarPlus. Set Google alerts for 'scholarship Tamil Nadu [year]'. Follow scholarship pages on social media.

samples.instruction: 10th ‡ÆÆ‡ØÅ‡Æü‡Æø‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§ ‡Æ™‡Æø‡Æ±‡Æï‡ØÅ ‡Æé‡Æ©‡Øç‡Æ©‡ØÜ‡Æ©‡Øç‡Æ© courses ‡Æá‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡ØÅ?
samples.current_output:
**10th-‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡ØÅ‡Æ™‡Øç ‡Æ™‡Æø‡Æ±‡Æï‡ØÅ Pathways:**

**1. Plus Two (+2) / Higher Secondary:**
- Duration: 2 years
- Streams: Science, Commerce, Arts, Vocational
- Board: TN State Board / CBSE

**2. Diploma (Polytechnic):**
- Duration: 3 years
- Branches: Civil, Mechanical, ECE, EEE, Computer, etc.
- Lateral entry to Engineering 2nd year possible
- Apply: tnpolytechnic.org

**3. ITI (Industrial Training Institute):**
- Duration: 6 months - 2 years
- Trades: Electrician, Fitter, Welder, Mechanic, COPA
- Direct employment opportunity
- Apply: itidata.tn.gov.in

**4. Paramedical Courses:**
- ANM (Auxiliary Nurse Midwife)
- Lab Technician
- X-Ray Technician
- Duration: 1-2 years

**5. Skill Development Courses:**
- NSDC certified courses
- Free under PMKVY
- Duration: 3-6 months
- Job placement support

**6. Open Schooling (NIOS):**
- For those who can't attend regular school
- Same validity as regular +2
- nios.ac.in

**Comparison Table:**

| Course | Duration | Entry | Job/Higher Studies |
|--------|----------|-------|-------------------|
| +2 | 2 years | 10th pass | UG admission |
| Diploma | 3 years | 10th pass | Job / Lateral entry |
| ITI | 6m-2y | 8th/10th | Direct job |
| Paramedical | 1-2 years | 10th pass | Healthcare jobs |

**‡Æé‡Æ®‡Øç‡Æ§ option best?**
- Higher studies interest: +2
- Quick job: ITI
- Technical job: Diploma

samples.instruction: Sandwich pattern diploma ‡Æé‡Æ©‡Øç‡Æ©? Regular-‡Æá‡Æ≤‡Æø‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æ®‡Øç‡Æ§‡ØÅ ‡Æé‡Æ©‡Øç‡Æ© ‡Æµ‡Æø‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡Æø‡ÆØ‡Ææ‡Æö‡ÆÆ‡Øç?
samples.current_output: Sandwich Diploma: Theory + Industrial training combined. Pattern: 1st year theory ‚Üí 2nd year industry (6 months paid training) ‚Üí 3rd year theory. Benefits: 1) Real work experience 2) Stipend during training ‚Çπ5,000-8,000/month 3) Job placement better 4) Industry connections. Offered at: NTTF, Central Polytechnics, select government colleges. Duration: Same 3 years. Highly recommended for practical learning.

samples.instruction: CA (Chartered Accountant) padippu eppadi aarambippathu?
samples.current_output: ICAI nadathum padippu. Levels: 1) Foundation (after 10th or +2) 2) Intermediate 3) Final. 3 year Articleship compulsory. Total duration: 4-5 years. Fee: Foundation ‚Çπ11,000, Inter ‚Çπ27,000, Final ‚Çπ32,000. Chennai-la ICAI coaching centers irukku. Work while studying possible.

samples.instruction: Madurai-la MBBS padikka government college-la seat kidaikkuma?
samples.current_output: Madurai Medical College-la 7.5% government school quota, OBC/BC/MBC reservation irukku. NEET-la 550+ vaangina government seat kedaikka chance irukku. Theni Medical College-layum try pannalam.

samples.instruction: NEET-la seat kidaikkal, drop year edukkalaama? Waste aagumaa?
samples.current_output: Drop year = Strategic decision, not waste. When good idea: 1) Close to cutoff - improvement chances high 2) Strong determination 3) Clear preparation plan. When risky: 1) First attempt poor score by big margin 2) No structured plan 3) Family pressure only. Statistics: Many successful doctors took 2-3 attempts. Alternative: Join backup course (B.Sc) + prepare NEET simultaneously. Drop year plan: Join test series, daily 8-10 hours, monthly assessment. One year invested wisely = lifetime career.

samples.instruction: School dropout-aagi vitten, padippai continue seiya enna vazhi?
samples.current_output: Options: 1) NIOS (National Institute of Open Schooling) - 10th/12th complete 2) TN State Open School - Tamil medium available 3) Private appearance through Distance Education 4) Skill training + later education. NIOS: www.nios.ac.in, exams twice a year, study at own pace. Age no bar. After 10th/12th: Regular college admission possible. Many successful people are NIOS students.

samples.instruction: En paiyan engineering vendaamnu solran - enna panrathu?
samples.current_output: Paiyanoda interest ennannu purinjukonga. Arts, Commerce, Vocational, Creative fields-layum nalla career opportunities irukku. Aptitude test edunga. Career counsellor-kitta pesunga. Force pannaadheenga.

samples.instruction: ‡Æâ‡Æ£‡Øç‡ÆÆ‡Øà‡ÆØ‡Ææ ‡Æ™‡Øä‡ÆØ‡Øç‡ÆØ‡Ææ: Myth: 30 ‡Æµ‡ÆØ‡Æö‡ØÅ ‡Æï‡Æü‡Æ®‡Øç‡Æ§‡Ææ‡Æ≤‡Øç ‡Æ™‡Æü‡Æø‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï late
samples.current_output: ‡Æâ‡Æ£‡Øç‡ÆÆ‡Øà: Fact: Learning has no age limit! Distance education: IGNOU, TNOU - no age bar. Success stories: People completing degrees at 40, 50, even 60. Benefits: Career switch, personal satisfaction, promotion eligibility. Government job age limit = only restriction (up to 35-40 for many). Skill courses: No age limit. Your motivation to learn > Your age. Start today!

samples.instruction: Free coaching enge kidaikkum? Government schemes irukkiradha?
samples.current_output: Free coaching options: 1) Tamil Nadu Government Free Coaching Centres - UPSC, TNPSC, SSC-ku major cities-la 2) BC/MBC Welfare Dept coaching 3) Adi Dravidar Welfare free coaching (SC/ST) 4) District Employment Office coaching 5) TNSDC skill centers. Online: NPTEL, SWAYAM, Unacademy free tier. Apply through respective department websites. Selection based on marks and income.

samples.instruction: NEET Exam endraal enna? Yaar ezhudhalaam?
samples.current_output:
**NEET Exam:**

**What:** Medical entrance exam by NTA

**Courses:** MBBS, BDS, BAMS, BHMS, Nursing, Veterinary

**Eligibility:**
- Age: 17+ (Dec 31)
- Education: 12th PCB
- Marks: General 50%, OBC/SC/ST 40%

**Attempts:** Unlimited

**Languages:** Tamil, English, Hindi + 10 more

**Apply:** neet.nta.nic.in (Dec-Jan)
**Fee:** ‚Çπ1,700 (General), ‚Çπ1,000 (SC/ST)

**TN Special:** 7.5% Govt school reservation

samples.instruction: Hardware and Networking course ‡Æ™‡Æü‡Æø‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡Æ≤‡Ææ‡ÆÆ‡Ææ?
samples.current_output: Good career option. Courses: 1) CCNA (Cisco) - Networking 2) CompTIA A+ - Hardware 3) MCSE (Microsoft) - Server admin 4) Hardware & Networking diploma. Duration: 3-12 months. Jobs: 1) Network administrator 2) System support 3) Hardware technician 4) IT helpdesk. Salary: ‚Çπ15,000-30,000. Demand: Every company needs IT support. NIELIT offers recognized courses. Self-employment: Computer repair shop.

samples.instruction: Community certificate eppadi vaanguvadhu? Time evvalavu aagum?
samples.current_output: Process: 1) Apply at Tahsildar office or e-Sevai 2) Documents: Aadhaar, parent community certificate, school TC mentioning community, family photo 3) Verification by RI 4) Issue by Tahsildar. Time: 15-30 days. One-time: Permanent certificate for lifetime. Required for: Reservation benefits, scholarships, government jobs. Tip: Get parents' certificate first, then children's easier. Online tracking: tnedistrict.tn.gov.in.

guidelines:
EDUCATION PACK GUIDELINES:
- Tanglish is acceptable for modern education topics
- Keep exam names (NEET, JEE, TNPSC) in English
- Use Tamil for explanations: ‡Æ§‡Øá‡Æ∞‡Øç‡Æµ‡ØÅ (exam), ‡Æï‡Æ≤‡Øç‡Æ≤‡ØÇ‡Æ∞‡Æø (college), ‡Æ™‡Ææ‡Æü‡Æ§‡Øç‡Æ§‡Æø‡Æü‡Øç‡Æü‡ÆÆ‡Øç (syllabus)
- Format with emoji headers: üìö, üéì, üìù
